An emergency meeting of the North Carolina Charter Education Foundation board was held tonight. The board voted to implement Plan C under the Governors guidelines. For the first quarter of the 2020-2021 school year Langtree Charter Academy with operate fully mobile. We know this may create a challenge for our families. Please know we are here to partner with you in ensuring your child(ren) receive the best education anywhere. Thank You for Your Continued Support,

Elizabeth Padgett

post_text:
Meet the Upper Campus Associate Principal!

Ms. Cesena has more than 30 years of education experience and 8 years of experience as a school leader in both middle and high schools. She served as Assistant Principal of instruction at both David W. Butler High School and Hopewell High School. Most recently she served as Assistant Principal of instruction at West Lincoln Middle School. She earned her Bachelor of Arts degree in English and Bachelor of Arts in education, secondary education in English from Wichita State University in Kansas. She earned her TESOL endorsement from Nova Southeastern University in Florida; a Master of Education in research and assessment from Jones International University in Colorado; and Master of School Administration from Wingate University in North Carolina. She is joined in leadership by Assistant Principal, Amy Wagner and Dean of Students, Deyonta Thacker.
